clarity_understandability.notes: Assesses overall clarity, ease of understanding, and definition quality. Penalized by TBDs and incomplete glossary.

completeness_issue_resolution.notes: Assesses how well all necessary requirements are covered and if reflection issues are resolved. Penalized by unaddressed reflection points.

actionability_fitness_for_purpose.notes: Assesses how well the PRD enables the next stage of development. Penalized by TBDs hindering direct action.

correctness_formatting_review.notes: Assesses accuracy of information, formatting consistency, and resolution of typos/errors.

product_security_nfr_coverage.notes: Assesses how well security NFRs for the product are covered in the PRD, based on reflection.
